      • formatJson

        public static org.json.JSONObject formatJson(Object... values)
        Take in a list of objects and format them as a JSONObject if even number of values is supplied: {value0:value1, value2:value3} if odd number, it will use the first value as a key for a nesed obejct {value0: value1: value2, value3: value4}
        Parameters:
        values - values list to be converted into a JSONObject
        Returns:
        JSONObject
